cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 95 mi ENE of Daytona Beach, Florida / 135 mi ESE of Jacksonville, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northwest along the southeast U.S. coast, forecast to turn north then northeast, tracking just offshore of the Mid-Atlantic and New England toward Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina / North Carolina coast (between Charleston SC and Cape Lookout NC)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch north of Surf City NC to Poquoson VA including Hampton Roads, Pamlico/Albemarle Sounds, Neuse and Pamlico Rivers
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning north of Savannah River GA to Surf City NC; Storm Surge Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Surf City NC; Tropical Storm Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Savannah River GA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida east coast, Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina coasts, then offshore Mid-Atlantic and New England waters including Cape Cod/Nantucket
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤7%) of sustained 34-kt winds; most likely breezy with gusts 30-40 mph late Fri night into Sat
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal inundation possible along Cape Cod and islands; negligible surge expected in Boston Harbor (<3 ft)
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rainfall, generally 1–2 inches possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells, high surf, and dangerous rip currents affecting Massachusetts Bay and adjacent waters
